turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I order a Starbucks espresso drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a ice pepper mint white chocolate mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, would you like to add milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, can you add almond milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what size do you want that in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get the venti iced?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, do you want whipped cream?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me place that order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i have ordered a venti iced peppermint mocha with almond milk with whipped cream to be picked up in daly city, ca, westlake shopping center.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your receipt will be texted to you.

items.name: ice pepper mint white chocolate mocha
